hero.description: I help you achieve the life of your dreams through one-on-one coaching sessions, personalized programs, and proven methods.

about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: Hello, I'm
about.name: Kumru Köseler
about.description1: With over 10 years of experience, I help individuals and professionals create meaningful transformations in their lives. Using scientific methods and an empathetic approach, I accompany each client on their unique journey.
about.description2: I am a spiritual guide and behavioral sciences expert who can help bring positive change to people's lives.
about.heroDescription: A mother who says "all children in the world are mine," a spiritual guide and behavioral sciences expert who studied behavioral sciences in England and Canada.
about.heroDescription2: We visited Kumru Köseler at her office in Akmerkez, with all my attention on my book "Magic Wish Diary" which I believe can become real, and the new year will bring beautiful things.
about.story1: I discovered the mystical power within me at a very young age. To pursue education in this direction, I chose management and behavioral sciences at Kingsley State (England) and York University in Canada, and graduated.
about.story2: Additionally, to further develop myself in my field, I obtained certifications by participating in certificate programs. As a guide and behavioral sciences expert, I continue to elevate my mystical consciousness to the highest level through my work.
about.story3: Today, whatever you think, you can attract to yourself, you can use the energy of intention. You live what you feel, observing people in front of you only through thought, I am a spiritual guide and behavioral sciences expert who has achieved amazing things with countless clients and can help bring positive change to their lives.
about.story4: One of the most important reasons I chose this profession is the shaping of consciousness at a young age and its effect on our entire life. My goal is to ensure our consciousness is formed healthily and with love, to help our children continue their lives as much happier individuals.
about.valuesDescription: The values that form the foundation of every relationship I build with my clients

empathy.description: I see each client as a unique individual and listen to their story.

timeline.description: Enriched my coaching methodology with NLP techniques.

about.ctaDescription: Take the first step to create positive change in your life. Let's meet with a free discovery session.

services.subtitle: Services
services.title: How Can I
services.description: I accompany you in reaching your goals with different coaching formats suitable for your needs.

relationship.title: Relationship Coaching
relationship.description: Building healthy relationships and communication skills

goal.title: Goal-Focused Coaching
goal.description: Setting clear goals and achieving them

services.optionsDescription: Different coaching formats for every need

oneOnOne.title: One-on-One Coaching
oneOnOne.shortDesc: Personalized, intensive, and transformative coaching sessions.
oneOnOne.fullDesc: In one-on-one coaching sessions conducted online or in person, we create a program completely tailored to you. We clarify your goals and ensure your step-by-step progress.

online.title: Online Sessions
online.shortDesc: Coaching via video call from anywhere in the world.
online.fullDesc: With online sessions conducted via Zoom or Google Meet, you can receive professional coaching support wherever you are. Flexible scheduling options.

messaging.title: Instant Messaging Support
messaging.shortDesc: Continuous support and guidance between sessions.
messaging.fullDesc: With the WhatsApp support line included in your coaching packages, I'm with you between sessions. I answer your questions and keep your motivation high.

corporate.title: Corporate Coaching
corporate.fullDesc: I offer leadership development, team coaching, and performance enhancement programs for corporate clients. Solutions tailored to your company culture.

goalTracking.title: Goal Tracking System
goalTracking.shortDesc: Goal setting and tracking with digital tools.
goalTracking.fullDesc: With a specially developed tracking system, we set your goals, measure your progress, and celebrate your achievements. Increase your motivation with visual reports.

group.title: Group Programs
group.shortDesc: Learn together with people who have similar goals.
group.fullDesc: In programs conducted with small groups, benefit from community power. Keep your motivation high with peer support.

services.processDescription: Our coaching process progresses in 4 simple steps

process.title: Program Selection
process.desc: We determine the right program for you

services.ctaTitle: Which Service Is Right for You?
services.ctaDescription: Let's evaluate your needs in a free discovery session and determine the most suitable program together.

programs.subtitle: Programs
programs.title: Transformation
programs.description: Options suitable for you from one-on-one coaching to hotel-inclusive retreat programs

oneOnOne.title: One-on-One Coaching
oneOnOne.subtitle: Online Session
oneOnOne.description: Online or face-to-face one-on-one coaching sessions. Custom program focused on your personal goals.

transformationRetreat.title: Transformation Retreat
transformationRetreat.subtitle: 3 Days - Hotel Stay
transformationRetreat.description: Intensive transformation program including luxury hotel accommodation. Powerful change with group dynamics.

vipRetreat.title: VIP Retreat
vipRetreat.subtitle: 4 Days - Premium Experience
vipRetreat.description: Limited attendance, intensive and transformative premium retreat experience.

retreatExperience.title: Retreat Experience
retreatExperience.description: What awaits you in our hotel-inclusive programs?

faq.a: Our retreat programs are open to everyone over 18 years old. Anyone who wants to take a new step in their personal development journey can participate.
Yes, hotel accommodation and specified meals are included in the price for all our retreat programs.
Our groups are limited to a maximum of 12 people for a quality experience. For VIP retreats, this number is 6-8 people.

faq.q: What are the cancellation and refund conditions?
faq.a: Full refund is provided up to 14 days before the program start date. Please contact us for detailed information.

programs.ctaDescription: All programs start with a free discovery session. Installment options available.
